recipe:
Turkey Burgers
FODMAP Friendly Egg and Diary Free
500 gms turkey mince 2 spring onions chopped 2 garlic cloves chopped 1 medium zucchini grated 2 tbsp olive oil 1-2 inches grated ginger 1 lemon grass finely chopped SandP to taste
Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl and make into patties. Cook in a couple of tablespoons of olive oil until cooked through and nicely browned. Serve with fresh salad and homemade chutney or sauce. You can double this recipe.
